Package patreon.java.resources

Class Tier

  • java.lang.Object
    • patreon.java.resources.shared.BaseResource
      • patreon.java.resources.Tier
  • public class Tier
extends BaseResource
    A membership level on a campaign, which can have benefits attached to it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Tier.TierField
      This enum represents the different fields or properties associated with the Tier resource.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Tier​(int amountCents, java.lang.String createdAt, java.lang.String description, java.util.List<java.lang.String> discordRoleIDs, java.lang.String editedAt, java.lang.String imageUrl, int patronCount, int postCount, boolean published, java.lang.String publishedAt, int remaining, boolean requiresShipping, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String unpublishedAt, java.lang.String url, int user_limit, java.util.List<Benefit> benefits, Campaign campaign, Media tierImage)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getAmountCents()
      Returns the monetary amount associated with this tier (in US cents).
      java.util.List<Benefit> getBenefits()
      Returns the benefits attached to the tier, which are used for generating deliverables.
      Campaign getCampaign()
      Returns the campaign the tier belongs to.
      java.lang.String getCreatedAt()
      Returns the date and time that this tier was created.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns the tier display description.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDiscordRoleIDs()
      Returns the Discord role IDs granted by this tier.
      java.lang.String getEditedAt()
      Returns the date and time that this tier was edited.
      java.lang.String getImageUrl()
      Returns the full qualified image URL associated with this tier.
      int getPatronCount()
      Returns the number of patrons currently registered for this tier.
      int getPostCount()
      Returns the number of posts published to this tier.
      java.lang.String getPublishedAt()
      Returns the date and time that this tier was last published.
      int getRemaining()
      Returns the remaining number of patrons who may subscribe, if there is a user limit.
      Media getTierImage()
      Returns the image file associated with the tier.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Returns the tier display title.
      java.lang.String getUnpublishedAt()
      Returns the date and time that this tier was unpublished, while applicable.
      java.lang.String getUrl()
      Returns the fully qualified URL associated with this tier.
      int getUserLimit()
      Returns the maximum number of patrons this tier is limited to, if applicable.
      boolean isPublished()
      Returns whether or not the tier is currently published.
      boolean isRequiresShipping()
      Returns whether or not this tier requires a shipping address from patrons.
